name: d3-fisheye
description: A fisheye plugin for d3 v4 with smoothing.

scripts.pretest: rm -rf build && mkdir build && rollup -f umd -n d3 -o build/d3-fisheye.js -- index.js
scripts.prepublish: npm run test && uglifyjs build/d3-fisheye.js -c -m -o build/d3-fisheye.min.js
scripts.postpublish: zip -j build/d3-fisheye.zip -- LICENSE README.md build/d3-fisheye.js build/d3-fisheye.min.js
